Package thothbot.parallax.plugin.postprocessing.client.shader

Interface Summary
ShaderDofMipmap.Resources  
ShaderFilm.Resources  
ShaderRriangleBlur.Resources  
 

Class Summary
ShaderBleachbypass Bleach bypass shader
ShaderBlend Blend two textures Based on three.js code
ShaderBokeh Depth-of-field shader with bokeh Based on three.js code
Ported from GLSL shader by Martins Upitis artmartinsh.blogspot.com
ShaderColorCorrection Color correction Based on three.js code.
ShaderColorify Colorify shader Based on three.js code
ShaderConvolution Convolution shader Based on three.js code Ported from o3d sample to WebGL / GLSL o3d.googlecode.com
ShaderDofMipmap Depth-of-field shader using mipmaps requires power-of-2 sized render target with enabled mipmaps Based on three.js code
From Matt Handley \@applmak
ShaderDotscreen Dot screen shader Based on three.js code
Based on glfx.js sepia shader github.com/evanw/glfx.js
ShaderFilm Film grain & scanlines shader Based on three.js code
Ported from HLSL to WebGL / GLSL truevision3d.com Screen Space Static Postprocessor Produces an analogue noise overlay similar to a film grain / TV static Original implementation and noise algorithm Pat 'Hawthorne' Shearon
Optimized scanlines + noise version with intensity scaling Georg 'Leviathan' Steinrohder
ShaderFocus Focus shader Based on three.js code
Based on PaintEffect postprocess from ro.me code.google.com/p/3-dreams-of-black
ShaderFxaa NVIDIA FXAA by Timothy Lottes
ShaderHorizontalBlur Two pass Gaussian blur filter (horizontal and vertical blur shaders) described in gamerendering.com and used in www.cake23.de.
ShaderHorizontalTiltShift Simple fake tilt-shift effect, modulating two pass Gaussian blur (see above) by vertical position Based on three.js code 9 samples per pass
standard deviation 2.7
"h" and "v" parameters should be set to "1 / width" and "1 / height"
"r" parameter control where "focused" horizontal line lies
ShaderLuminosity Luminosity
ShaderNormalmap Normal map shader Based on three.js code compute normals from heightmap
ShaderRriangleBlur Triangle blur shader Based on three.js code
Based on glfx.js triangle blur shader github.com/evanw/glfx.js A basic blur filter, which convolves the image with a pyramid filter.
ShaderScreen Full-screen textured quad shader Based on three.js code
ShaderSepia Sepia tone shader Based on thrre.js code
Based on glfx.js sepia shader github.com/evanw/glfx.js
ShaderSsao Screen-space ambient occlusion shader Based on three.js code
Ported from SSAO GLSL shader v1.2 assembled by Martins Upitis (martinsh) (devlog-martinsh.blogspot.com).
ShaderUnpackDepthRGBA Unpack RGBA depth shader - show RGBA encoded depth as monochrome color Based on three.js code
ShaderVerticalBlur Vertical Blur shader Based on three.js code
ShaderVerticalTiltShift Vertical Tilt Shift shader.
ShaderVignette Vignette shader Based on three.js code
based on PaintEffect postprocess from ro.me code.google.com/p/3-dreams-of-black
